revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #52 Chilan |image = [[File:Chilan.png]] |caption = This Berry can be cored out and dried to make a whistle. Blowing through its hole makes an indescribable sound. |growtime = 2h 0m 0s |harvest = 10 berries |replant = 5% |points = 500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *25 dry *10 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Chilan''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Chople]] with at least 3 other Chople berries. The surrounded Chople will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 2 hours 23 mins 20 secs || 3 hours 36 mins || 6 hours 24 mins || 10 hours 30 mins - 23 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChilanTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChilanTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ChilanTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 hours -
6 hours || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 53 mins 20 secs -
1 hour 46 mins 30 secs || 11 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Chilan berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Chople.png|30px]]
